articles.title: Saks Global files for bankruptcy amid luxury market strains - CNN
articles.description: Saks Global, the parent company of luxury retailer Saks Fifth Avenue, filed for bankruptcy protection late Tuesday, according to court documents filed in US Bankruptcy Court in Houston, Texas.

articles.title: FTC accuses AI search engine of 'rampant consumer deception' - NPR
articles.description: Federal officials say a company that operates hundreds of landing pages for AI answers is running an operation that has duped thousands of users, who were unable to stop costly monthly charges.
